EmailTemplate.name: Patent Watch.January 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: AERO Patent Watch - January 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Email Title January 2014
Please find a link to the Aero Patent Watch – January 2014 <http://teamsites.honeywell.com/sites/Aero_Patent_Watch/Shared Documents/home.aspx?PageView=Shared>. The Aero Patent Watch provides a monthly view of published or granted patents by the U.S. Patent and Trademark office by Honeywell or peer companies in our area of interest. <http://teamsites.honeywell.com/sites/Aero_Patent_Watch/Shared Documents/home.aspx?PageView=Shared> As new issues are released, prior issues are moved to the Archive <http://teamsites.honeywell.com/sites/Aero_Patent_Watch/Shared Documents/Archives.aspx> section. Additional Aero IP processes and background information is available at the Aero IP Community Wiki. <http://teamsites.honeywell.com/sites/IPTracking/Wiki/Pages/Home.aspx>
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thanks, Dan Dan Gutfreund IP Process Leader Aerospace, Advanced Technology, Technology Strategy 21111 N 19th Ave (M/S 2J35A5) Phoenix, AZ 85027 Phone: +1 602 436-9030 Mobile: +1 480 258-8692 Dan.Gutfreund@Honeywell.com <mailto:Dan.Gutfreund@Honeywell.com> Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2013 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
